thread.title: Coroner Reveals Sad Details About Clemson Associate AD's Death
thread.title_full: Coroner Reveals Sad Details About Clemson Associate AD's Death

author: Nick Brown
title: Coroner Reveals Sad Details About Clemson Associate AD's Death
text:
Coroner Reveals Sad Details About Clemson Associate AD's Death 12up 6 hrs ago Nick Brown © 12up Clemson ​This story simply gets worse and worse by the day.
Earlier this week, Clemson's Associate Director of Planned Giving went missing after not reporting to work and his family members not being able to get in touch with him.
A search party and police investigation were then launched to find him.
BREAKING: Sheriff confirms Clemson assoc. athletic director of planned giving Bert Henderson missing https://t.co/Kl3SG9v3eq pic.twitter.com/sPrG2gQvz9
— FOX Carolina News (@foxcarolinanews) February 21, 2017
​​Sadly, the story did not have a great ending.
Henderson's body was found the following afternoon, and a death investigation was launched to determine the cause and situation surrounding the tragic event.
Terrible update: missing Clemson assoc. athletic director found dead: https://t.co/gBPK4KmXOx https://t.co/JU9PQs99MS
— RedditCFB (@RedditCFB) February 21, 2017
​​Now, the investigation has finished, and unfortunately, the details continue to grow darker and darker.
According to reports, Henderson's cause of death was that of a self-inflicted gunshot wound. There is currently no speculation as to what may have driven him to this point, but the investigation continues on.
It is hard enough to deal with a situation like this, but that aforementioned fact does not make it any easier. Our thoughts and prayers remain with his family at this time.
